column22: R1 Class 20 and Class 37/5 locomotives that conform to RA6 shall apply those restrictions applicable to the Class 31/4 R2 10mph over bridge 26 (9m 52ch) R3 20mph over bridge 30 (11m 38ch) R4 20mph over bridge 97 (30m 50ch) R5 20mph over bridge 108 (33m 14ch) R6 Double Heading prohibited except for providing assistance and then at only 10mph over the above structures
